long_description: Strap the Counter Assault Bear bell to your backpack, clothing or trekking pole before heading out into the wilderness. Its loud jingle alerts bears and other animals to your presence. Movement from hiking causes a steady, loud ring. The 1 in. wide nylon webbing strap features a rip-and-stick closure for easy mounting.
short_description: Strap the Counter Assault Bear bell to your backpack, clothing or trekking pole before heading out into the wilderness. Its loud jingle alerts bears and other animals to your presence.
